segments.text: Do you have anything which can prevent wrinkles and freckles ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My skin is kind of oily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This nutrition cream is for anti-wrinkling and whitening which is a newcomer brand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 60.The price is reasonable for its large quantity . What's more , there are some gifts attaching for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . What are the gifts attaching ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can take one tonic or hand cream .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . You can try this kind of gel which can prevent freckle , the effect will be better if you use this powder foundation applied with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the very thing I want .
segments.speaker: S2
